SEARCH
Package edu.escuelaing.arsw.ASE.app

Class EchoServerImpl

java.lang.Object
edu.escuelaing.arsw.ASE.app.EchoServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EchoServerRMI, Remote
public class EchoServerImpl extends Object implements EchoServerRMI
The EchoServerImpl class implements the EchoServerRMI interface and provides functionality for an RMI (Remote Method Invocation) echo server.

  • Constructor Details

    • EchoServerImpl

      public EchoServerImpl(String ipRMIregistry, int puertoMRIregistry, String nombreDePublicacion)
      Constructor to create an instance of EchoServerImpl and register it with the RMI registry.
      Parameters:
      ipRMIregistry - The IP address of the RMI registry.
      puertoMRIregistry - The port number of the RMI registry.
      nombreDePublicacion - The name under which the server object will be published.

  • Method Details

    • echo

      public String echo(String cadena) throws RemoteException
      Echo method that returns a string prefixed with "desde el servidor: ".
      Specified by:
      echo in interface EchoServerRMI
      Parameters:
      cadena - The input string from the client.
      Returns:
      The response string from the server.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method is the entry point of the application. It creates an instance of EchoServerImpl and starts the server.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments (not used in this application).
